title: Elegant, Equitable, and Efficient
text: We work with with universities to help make their next career fair equitable and effiecient using our elegant platform. We help students discover and meet their career goals while providing real-time analytics for administrators and companies. Schedule a demo with us to learn more about how our solution can improve your school's career fair.

___DELETE_ME_TO_USE___section.title: Why Antd?
___DELETE_ME_TO_USE___section.content: Ant Design is a React UI library that has a lot of easy-to-use components for building elegant UI.

___DELETE_ME_TO_USE___section.title: Why styled-components?
___DELETE_ME_TO_USE___section.content: Styled Components gives you total control over your components.
